rules_text:
Whenever a creature with toughness 4 or more enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
Creatures with toughness 4 or greater you control have “{W}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.”
notes:

Creatures you control assign combat damage equal to their toughness rather than their power. > Whenever a creature toughness 4 or more enters the battlefield under your control, you draw a card and gain 2 life.
